doc.title: Adria Urlaubsfilme 1954-68 (Die Schule des Sehens I)
doc.plot: A collection of countless holiday films filled with clichés. The material dates from the fifties and sixties when holiday filming was more common than now. Gustav Deutsch's approach was simple and effective: He ordered the clichés systematically, and edited them into a small series. (Rotterdam Film Festival - Catalogue 1994)
